coreAttributes.name: horseshoe
coreAttributes.description: A set of four horseshoes. Although they're of the right shape and size to fit an anthro, an enchantment placed upon them repels them from anything other than feral hoofs.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] onto the horseshoes, at which point their arcane enchantment activates, attaching themselves securely to [npc.her] hoofs.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(direct)] [npc2.name] to step onto the horseshoes, at which point their arcane enchantment activates, attaching themselves securely to [npc2.her] hoofs.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step onto the horseshoes, at which point their arcane enchantment activates, attaching themselves securely to [npc2.her] hoofs.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stomp)] [npc.her] hoofs against the ground, forcing the horseshoes to undo their enchantment and fall off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(direct)] [npc2.name] to stomp [npc2.her] hoofs against the ground, which forces the horseshoes to undo their enchantment and fall off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(order)] [npc2.name] to stomp [npc2.her] hoofs against the ground, which forces the horseshoes to undo their enchantment and fall off.
